title: Blaze Pizza
typeOfFood: Lacto, Pizza, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Assembly line style franchise pizzeria. Could build your own pizza with various veggies, then choose marinara or hot red sauce or white sauce. Has vegan cheese. pizza cooks within 2 minutes over the hearth. Reported this location uses separate pizza cutting blades for the vegan and vegetarian pizzas, but you have make sure to remind the staff to use it.
